Admission Statistics   Request Materials   How to Apply   Financial Aid   FAQ   APPLY                                   Transforming Students into Scholars    PhD students develop into researchers through one-on-one faculty mentoring.                  Academic Success    Graduates shown now sit on the faculties at Yale, Harvard, Univ. of Florida, and Wharton; pictured with faculty advisers.                  A Collaborative Community    Students discuss valuation methodologies at an accounting seminar.                  At the Forefront of Business Knowledge    Renowned faculty and research excellence put Stern PhD students at the forefront of business knowledge.                  Take Action       Attend our Open House    Attend a Recruiting Fair               Request Information      Sign Up                 The Stern Advantage      Our formula for success includees having a world renowned and dedicated faculty, a 2:1 faculty-to-student ratio, a supportive and collaborative community, and a location in the center of global business. Together we create the best opportunities for students to develop their research talents and to prepare for academic careers. Read more .                Explore Possible   NYU Stern's doctoral students thrive in an atmosphere of intellectural rigor and creative collaboration. We cultivate colleagues - most go on to become top rate scholars who advance state of the art research in their fields. Our program offers eight areas of study:           Accounting     Economics     Finance     Information Systems     Management     Marketing     Operations     Statistics                   PhD Alumni Spotlight      Beibei Li’s research focuses on the economics of information technology. In particular, she is interested in understanding how knowledge created in various channels mediated by social media today affects the behavior of various players in the market (e.g., how does online word-of-mouth change the economic decisions of consumers?) Read more .             News & Announcements          Congratulations to Accounting PhD student, Seil Kim, who was awarded a $25,000 grant through the Deloitte Foundation’s annual Doctoral Fellowship program. Read more .         Our application deadline for Fall 2015 admission has passed. Please check back soon for information on applying to our Fall 2016 class. Ph.D. Programs, Graduate School of Arts and Science | NYU                                                  Navigation       Graduate School of Arts and Science                 About Arts and Science | Departments and Programs | The Faculty       About GSAS | Programs | Admissions | Students | Alumni | Give to GSAS               Home > Ph.D. Programs         Ph.D. Programs       A doctorate is the pinnacle of an arts and science education. Founded in 1886, the Graduate School of Arts and Science at NYU is among the oldest schools offering doctoral programs in the United States. Today NYU’s doctoral programs span the humanities, sciences, and social sciences, and students pursue cutting-edge research with the close supervision of NYU’s internationally recognized research faculty. New York City resources complement and enhance our vibrant intellectual communities. Use the links below to explore Doctor of Philosophy and dual advanced degrees at New York University. Ph.D. Programs Dual Degree Programs Inter-University Doctoral Consortium                     The Graduate School       About GSAS       Programs       GSAS Application Resource Center       Financial Aid       Policies and Procedures       Scholarly Development       Student Affairs     Ph.D. Programs     Master's Programs       Give to GSAS       Alumni and Alumnae       Events                      Contact Us | Faculty and Staff                             Contact Us | Faculty and Staff
